p:
We have demonstrated that the selectivity for electrocatalytic O 2 reduction by Mn(
tbu dhbpy)Cl 1 with TFEOH as a proton donor can be altered from the 2H +/2e − product H 2O 2 to the 4H +/4e − product H 2O when BQ is added as a co-catalyst. Furthermore, current increases occur relative to the intrinsic performance of 1, consistent with an enhanced rate of catalysis. Unlike the only previous report we are aware of,
8 b
this co-electrocatalytic effect leverages a non-covalent assembly between the added proton donor and redox mediator to achieve these improvements ( Fig. 5).
